title: User (computing)
extract: A user is a person who utilizes a computer or network service. Users of computer systems and software products generally lack the technical expertise required to fully understand how they work. Power users use advanced features of programs, though they are not necessarily capable of computer programming and system administration.
extract_html: A user is a person who utilizes a computer or network service.
